All Classes

Class Description
ApplicationAuthenticationSuccessHandler
Initiates the proper procedures following a successful login.
ApplicationController
ApplicationController is the controller for when an applicant makes an application.
ApplicationDTO
A Data Transfer Object class used for transferring the first name and the last name of users matching a searched for application.
ApplicationLogoutSuccessHandler
Initiates the proper procedures following a successful application logout.
ApplicationSecurity
Handles configurations concerning authentication and verification of users using the Recruitment Application.
Authority
Represents a stored authority An authority denotes the access levels of a User
AuthorityRepository
Serves as an interface for handling Authority related database calls.
Availability
Represents a stored Availability Maps a user to a specific availability interval
AvailabilityForm
Stores the availability period values entered by, as well as the the user when performing a new job application.
AvailabilityFormConstraint
Custom constraint for AvailabilityForm.
AvailabilityFormValidator
Validation of AvailabilityForm.
AvailabilityRepository
Serves as an interface for handling availability related database calls.
CacheConfig
Used as a caching abstraction to improve the performance of the system.
Competence
Represents a stored Competence
CompetenceForm
Stores the values entered by a user when a new application is being entered.
CompetenceProfile
Maps a User to a specific Competence One User may have many Competences
CompetenceRepository
Serves as an interface for handling competence related database calls.
CompetenceService
A service class handling retrieval of competence information from the applications database.
CompetenceTranslation
Represents a stored translation of one specific Competence to one specific Language
CompetenceTranslationRepository
Serves as an interface for handling competence related database calls.
ErrorHandler
ErrorHandler is a controller to catch all unexpected exceptions and deliver a generic error message to the client.
Language
Represents a stored Language Maps competenceTranslations to specific languages
LanguageRepository
Serves as an interface for handling languages related database calls.
ListController
Serves as the controller for when a recruiter wants to search and list applications of interest.
ListForm
Stores the parameters entered by the user via the ListView and serves as a DTO class.
ListFormConstraint
A custom constraint for the class ListForm.
ListFormValidator
Validates a <>ListForm object.
LoginController
Checks if the user is logged in and if that is the case redirects the user to to the applications root URL.
Main
Serves as the main class of the recruitment application where the program is initialized.
MockBeanConfig  
MockBeanConfig.EmailDispatcher  
RestoreController
Checks if the user is logged in and if that is the case redirects the user to to the applications root URL.
RestoreForm
Stores the email field entered requesting an account restore.
RootController
RootController controls the user's rootview, i.e.
SearchService
Handles searches for and returns applications stored in the "Recruitment Applications" database.
SearchServiceError
A exception class thrown when errors concerning searches in the applications has occurred.
UnmigratedAvailability
When the database is migrated, some users are not valid (not uniquely identifiable, missing email etc.) Later iterations of the product could include "rescue my account" functionality, then this data must be present This class specifies structure for this data.
UnmigratedAvailabilityRepository
Serves as an interface for handling Unmigrated data related database calls.
UnmigratedCompetenceProfile
When the database is migrated, some users are not valid (not uniquely identifiable, missing email etc.) Later iterations of the product could include "rescue my account" functionality, then this data must be present This class specifies structure for this data.
UnmigratedCompetenceProfileRepository
Serves as an interface for handling Unmigrated data related database calls.
UnmigratedPerson
When the database is migrated, some users are not valid (not uniquely identifiable, missing email etc.) Later iterations of the product could include "rescue my account" functionality, then this data must be present This class specifies structure for this data.
UnmigratedPersonRepository
Serves as an interface for handling Authority related database calls.
User
Represents a stored User
UserRepository
An interface for handling <>User related database handling.
UserService
A service class for handling database calls concerning <>User entities.
UserService.Role
User role the role of the user determines access levels
UserServiceError
ValidationError instances represent an business level error in a requested action
UserServiceError.ERROR_CODE
Denotes a specific error type
